landing.hero.title: Wisdom Through
landing.hero.description: Harness the collective intelligence of multiple AI agents debating your questions. Get balanced, well-reasoned answers through structured deliberation and expert judgment.
landing.hero.secondaryHint: You can sign in with Google or email on the next step.

landing.snapshot.description: Agents and judges assemble in a virtual chamber, exchanging arguments until a champion answer emerges.

landing.feature.multi.description: Multiple AI agents with different viewpoints craft answers together.
landing.feature.judges.title: Expert Judging
landing.feature.judges.description: Impartial judges score arguments, keeping reasoning balanced.
landing.feature.synthesis.title: Synthesized Wisdom
landing.feature.synthesis.description: Receive a champion answer that integrates diverse perspectives.
landing.selector.caption: Choose your intelligence
landing.selector.title: Multi‑LLM Chamber tuned for strategy, research, or shipping
landing.selector.description: Blend GPT‑4o, Claude 3.5, and Gemini Pro depending on the mission. Each profile comes with curated prompts, temperature, and rubric tweaks.
landing.footer.prompt: Ready to see the chamber in action? Summon a full debate run.

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Elo-style ratings derived from judge ballots. Wilson intervals flag uncertainty until a persona logs enough matches.
leaderboard.error.short: Leaderboard is temporarily unavailable. Please try again shortly.
leaderboard.error.long: Leaderboard is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
leaderboard.footer.note: Ratings update automatically after each debate finishes. Wilson interval uses 95% confidence for wins vs. losses.
leaderboard.table.empty: No ratings yet. Run a debate to seed the leaderboard.

analytics.header.title: Chamber analytics
analytics.header.description: Totals update whenever debates are created, completed, or exported.
analytics.sections.winRates.title: Persona performance
analytics.sections.score.title: Judge ribbons
analytics.empty.overviewTitle: Analytics arrive after your first debate
analytics.empty.overviewDescription: Run a session and this page will unlock win rates, score ribbons, and activity.
methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.description: Consultaion combines per-judge pairwise ballots, Elo-style updates, and Wilson confidence intervals to keep the leaderboard statistically honest.
methodology.section.pairwise.title: Pairwise votes
methodology.section.pairwise.body: Each judge compares every persona head-to-head. Ties are dropped. We log the winner, loser, judge, optional category, and timestamp in pairwise_vote.
methodology.section.elo.title: Elo + Bradley–Terry
methodology.section.elo.body: Ratings start at 1500. We apply Elo updates with K=32 for the first 15 matches, then K=24. This mirrors the Bradley–Terry logistic model and stays stable for live updates.
methodology.section.wilson.title: Wilson confidence interval
methodology.section.wilson.body: Win rate is shown with a 95% Wilson interval. New personas get a NEW badge until they reach 15 matches.
methodology.section.cadence.title: Update cadence
methodology.section.cadence.body: Ratings update immediately after each debate. Admins can force recomputes via POST /ratings/update/<debate_id>.
methodology.section.antigaming.title: Anti-gaming
methodology.section.antigaming.body: Runs inherit the creator’s scope. Public leaderboard rows ignore private debates unless shared. Abusive streaks can be zeroed by clearing pairwise rows for that debate.
methodology.section.brand.title: Brand usage
methodology.section.brand.body: The Consultaion mark comes in stone (default) and amber (for dark or stone backdrops). Keep padding at least 16px and avoid recoloring the vector directly.
hall.title: Distinguished debates of the House of AI
hall.description: Debates where one model’s answer became the Consultaion champion. Browse prompts, winning personas, and jump into the full transcript.
hall.empty.title: No Hall of Fame debates yet
hall.empty.description: After a few decisive wins, your champions will appear here.
hall.notice.emptyFiltered: No debates available yet. Run a new session to populate the Hall of Fame.
hall.card.noExcerpt: Champion answer unavailable. This debate may have been generated in mock mode.

models.empty.description: Once you run a few debates, each model’s win rate and average score will appear here.

pricing.title: Amber-Mocha pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that matches your workload. Free users get generous limits; Pro unlocks exports and higher caps.

runs.hero.description: Filter personal, shared, or global debates, switch scopes, and jump straight to an amber-tinted run card. Keyboard-friendly and WCAG-safe.

runs.scope.note: Share a run with a team to make it visible to collaborators.

runs.empty.description: Adjust the search text or clear the status filter to view all debates.

settings.nav.title: Settings
settings.overview.title: Settings overview
settings.overview.description: Tune your cockpit preferences, manage billing, and update profile details.
settings.overview.cardParagraph1: Profile editing now lives under “Profile” so you can tune your display name, avatar, and timezone. Billing and team controls will gradually move here as well.
settings.overview.cardParagraph2: Chamber configuration and advanced knobs still rely on Consultaion environment variables today. This panel will continue to grow as we productize those toggles.
settings.profile.signInRequired: You must be signed in to edit your profile.
settings.profile.section.title: Amber-Mocha identity
settings.profile.section.description: Adjust your display name, avatar, and timezone so run receipts feel personal.
